chapter.title: Quick start
chapter.para: Inheriting from GF_FORMAT adds the feature format to the current class. format takes two arguments: a format specification and an array of parameters. This array must be an array of references. For example ARRAY [BOOLEAN] does not work with SmartEiffel, but ARRAY [BOOLEAN_REF] does work.
format returns a STRING where all format specifications have been replaced by their corresponding parameters..
chapter.programlisting:
class
TEST
inherit
GF_FORMAT
creation
make
feature -- Initialization
make is do print (format ("?s ?i", <<"hello", 2>>)) end
end
